This is an example implementation of authentication by JSON Web Tokens (JWT) using the https://jwt.io library.

The user submits a username and password, and receives a token which is used as authentication elsewhere in the API to verify the claim that the user "is" username

The project is comprised of a backend API server written in Node, and a simple HTML/javascript frontend client (this page). The source code is at https://github.com/rendall/jwt-implementation

Enter a username and password, and submit it to the auth API endpoint. Try username 'abc' and password '123'


When auth returns a token, submit it to the verify API
